title: Ambrosia Casino

sections.title: BlackJack
sections.description: Developed a program to store profiles, game results, and every currency transaction. Used Wynncraft's in-game currency to convert to Casino credits.
comments: I modified another person's code for the BlackJack game logic after asking permission to use thier code.

sections.title: Roulette
sections.description: Created Roulette (with a SPINNING WHEEL) utilizing the profile system put in place from BlackJack
summary: Because Discord is a messaging app, I had to think of a clever solution to show a spinning wheel. I send unique GIFs of the spinning wheel landing on the number that is chosen
I created a program to pregenerate GIFs for each number it could land on with 10 variations each number chaning the time or velocity

The betting system is also complex because of the variations of bets are possible. We decided on a flow chart with buttons to navigate from high level decsions to more precise decisions about where you want to place your bet
comments: I'm very proud of the spinning wheel with 370 different GIFs for the 37 numbers possible to land on
Development haulted when Wynncraft banned player-run casinos using their currency, however the bot is still used unoffically with a smaller audience

It was a very enjoyable project. There was a heated debate on how to handle proving the fairness of the game. I was looking forward to utilizing crypographic keys to verify it before casinos were banned in-game.
